thread.title: Try Not to Drool - Hidden Valley Is Selling a Ranch Dressing Fountain!
thread.title_full: Try Not to Drool - Hidden Valley Is Selling a Ranch Dressing Fountain!

author: Terry Carter
title: Try Not to Drool - Hidden Valley Is Selling a Ranch Dressing Fountain!
text:
Where You Can Buy a Hidden Valley Ranch Dressing Fountain Try Not to Drool â€” Hidden Valley Is Selling a Ranch Dressing Fountain! March 12, 2017 130 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
This is not a drill: Hidden Valley is now selling the ranch fountain of your dreams. Described as "the ultimate dip dispensing party companion," the $100 fountain also comes with another mouth-watering perk: a one-year supply of Hidden Valley Ranch to keep the cascade flowing all year long. You can order the fountain (or a $50 jewel-encrusted Hidden Valley Ranch bottle and other ranch goodies) from Flavour Gallery's website today!
